idea:

Founded in the year 2018 by Shyam Singh, FranchiseDiscovery came to life to empower Indian franchising business with comprehensive choice with just one click. The company started its journey by using the power of technology and digital inquiry and the extensive demand of the rapidly developing Indian franchisee market.

idea:
Playvolution is an EdTech company operating in the early education space. The company's focus is on creating a 'Phygital' product experience: a combination of physical and digital content to enhance the learning experience. This type of product combination caters to the needs of children in the age group 2-6 years. Children in this age range not only have the innate ability to learn effortlessly but also the need to develop hands-on skills.

Using a combination of Physical products like storybooks, activity books, flashcards, etc that come to life when scanned with the AR app, Playvolution is creating a Phygital ecosystem of learning that can teach kids of the age group of 2 to 6 years various topics using a blend of Augmented Reality, Game-based learning built on a robust layer of a proprietary data-driven AI-engine that encourages a self-paced learning journey for the child.
name: PLAYVOLUTION EDTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a dedicated team of energy professionals exploring the possibilities of zero emission in both old and new vehicles and also on all Internal Combustion Engines.

After extensive research we have developed a new product. Power O2 is a Pre-Combustion Technology Catalytic Converter.

Power O2 is a patented product which helps to reduce emission drastically and converts all types of vehicles and IC Engines from EURO III /BHARAT III to EURO VI / BHARAT VI stage as per the present emission norms applicable for manufacturing new vehicles in India.

Inventor and Patentee: Mr. Biman Kumar Dutta

Power O2 REDUCES EMISSION-converts old vehicles from BHARAT/EURO III to BHARAT/EURO VI and above.

Power O2 enables FUEL SAVING: 15 to 20 % fuel saving in all types of vehicles including new vehicles despite congested roads in Metro cities.

Power O2 works on all types of fuels like Diesel, Petrol, Methanol, CNG, LPG and Bio diesel.

Power O2 ENHANCES POWER because of complete combustion of fuels.

Power O2 enables better pick-up and smooth functioning of the engines and negligible maintenance cost.

Power O2 reduces emission of harmful elements like Carbon Monoxide, Nitrous Oxide, Methane and Sulfur Dioxide into the environment.

Keeps the environment pollution free.

Diseases caused by air pollution can be reduced.

Conservation of precious crude oil helps in conservation of environment.

Indian government can save crores of rupees/dollar on fuel import and Power O2 can help the government to reduce foreign exchange drainage.

Old vehicles can be improved to Bharat VI standards; hence old vehicle life will be extended. This will help millions of middle class citizens and especially drivers whose livelihood depends on their cars.

Power O2 will help reduce Indiaâ€™s carbon footprint.

Power O2 can create employment opportunities for thousands of citizens.

Power O2 cleans carbon deposit in the engine

Power O2 helps in longer engine life and drastically reduces the engine maintenance cost and reduces engine breakdowns

Power O2 helps in improved AC cooling with a smoother engine. It offers extra cooling without decreasing car speed.

Because of complete combustion, Power O2 will enable our customers to drive on top gear at a speed as low as 35 kms per hour

Power O2 works on all types of IC Engines like cars, light and heavy commercial vehicles, generators, excavators and tippers etc.

Most important of all, our product helps to reduce and curb pollution which is a great gift to our Earth and benefits our future generations.

Power O2 was evaluated at ARAI and the result of the evaluation was well above Bharat VI/Euro VI emission levels.

Product was evaluated at NABL Accredited laboratory as well and again the result of the evaluation was well above Bharat VI/Euro VI emission levels.
name: CARBON CAPTURE ENVIRO TECH PRIVATE LIMITED
